title: Disconnects With Ranked Matches
body:
Don't you just hate it when you get into a ranked match and the first thing you notice is that one of your teammates is either afk or dc'd, he then proceedes to stay like this for around about 10-15 minutes before finally returning, 9 levels behind and more than likely going to feed.....
This drives me INSANE, it unfairly gives the advantage to the opposing team for something that no one in your team other than that person has control over, meaning that a single person holds the entire fate of the game at his fingertips at the very start of the match :/
while I understand that you can try to push out a 4vs5 win or such, it just drives me insane that because you are missing that one person, one or maybe all (if it's a jungler) lane/s are missing a presence that could quite easily have turned the match in your favour

I propose something that I actually found off of Dota 2, where that if someone dc's for a certain amount of time in the first 20 minutes of the match, the entire match is completely void, meaning that there is no stats taken into account or that you lose/gain any LP thanks to the unfair play, while I know this then encourages people too just leave straight after this happens, it's better than getting up to your promo's, you're on your last game and you need to win and next thing you know you're missing one of the players in your group, which then snowballs to one lane getting overly fed and snowballing into an easy win for the opposing team {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 

I dunno, it probably won't work how I think it would, but it would be nice to have some way to allow for these kinds of situations and make it so that maybe you don't lose AS much LP?? leave some idea's and please upvote this, while most people would probably ignore it, it's rather nice to give Rito some ideas from time to time and see what they do with them.
